mapper.select: select QNA_NUM qnaNum, QNA_TYPE qnaType, QNA_TITLE qnaTitle, ADMIN_ID adminId from QNA
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET ADMIN_ID = #{adminId}, QNA_TITLE = #{qnaTitle}, QNA_TYPE = #{qnaType}, QNA_CONTENT = #{qnaContent} WHERE QNA_NUM = #{qnaNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NUM, ADMIN_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_TYPE, QNA_CONTENT) VALUES (#{qnaNum}, #{adminId}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaType}, #{qnaContent})
